snippet: The mayor of Los Angeles voiced support on Friday for a new state law barring public agencies from refusing job applications from people convicted of a crime and is pushing city leaders to broaden the measure to private-sector jobs and housing....

headline.print_headline: L.A. Mayor Urges Less Emphasis on Criminal Records in Hiring, Housing
headline.main: L.A. Mayor Urges Less Emphasis on Criminal Records in Hiring, Housing

lead_paragraph: The mayor of Los Angeles voiced support on Friday for a new state law barring public agencies from refusing job applications from people convicted of a crime and is pushing city leaders to broaden the measure to private-sector jobs and housing.
